source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_migration_db.vw_nsip_representation

AS

SELECT DISTINCT

    RR.representationId
    ,RR.referenceId
    ,RR.examinationLibraryRef
    ,COALESCE(RR.caseRef, '') AS caseRef
    ,RR.caseId
    ,CASE
        WHEN RR.status = 'New' OR RR.status = 'In Progress' THEN
            'awaiting_review'
        WHEN RR.status = 'Complete' THEN
            'valid'
        WHEN RR.status = 'Do Not Publish' THEN
            'invalid'
        ELSE 
            LOWER(RR.status)
    END AS status
    ,COALESCE(RR.originalRepresentation, '') AS originalRepresentation
    ,RR.redacted
    ,RR.redactedRepresentation
    ,RR.redactedBy
    ,RR.redactedNotes
    ,CASE
        -- WHEN su2.serviceUserType = 'Agent' THEN
        --     'AGENT'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'An Organisation' THEN 
            'ORGANISATION'
        -- WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses' and SU2.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN
        --     'ORGANISATION'
        -- WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses' THEN
        --     'PERSON'
        -- WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' and SU2.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN
            --  'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' THEN
            'PERSON'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Myself' THEN
            'PERSON'
        ELSE
            RR.representationFrom
    END AS representationFrom
    ,SU1.id AS representedId
    ,COALESCE(SU2.id, '') AS representativeId
    ,CASE
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'An Organisation' THEN
            'ORGANISATION'
        -- WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses' and SU.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN
        --     'ORGANISATION'
        -- WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Members of the Public/Businesses'THEN
        --     'PERSON'
        -- WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' and SU.Organisation IS NOT NULL THEN 
        --     'ORGANISATION'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Another Individual or Organisation' THEN
            'PERSON'
        WHEN RR.representationFrom = 'Myself' THEN
            'PERSON'
        ELSE
            RR.registerFor
    END AS registerFor
    ,CASE
        WHEN RR.representationType = 'Other Statutory Consultees' THEN
            'Statutory Consultees'
        ELSE
            RR.representationType
        END AS representationType
        ,RR.dateReceived
        ,RR.attachmentIds


FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation AS RR
	
INNER JOIN (

    SELECT representationId, MAX(IngestionDate) AS latest_date
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation
    WHERE LOWER(ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
    GROUP BY representationId
    
) latest ON RR.representationId = latest.representationId AND RR.IngestionDate = latest.latest_date   

INNER JOIN odw_curated_migration_db.service_user AS SU1 -- represented
    ON RR.caseRef = SU1.caseReference AND SU1.serviceUserTypeInternal = 'RepresentationContact_Represented'
        
LEFT JOIN odw_curated_migration_db.service_user AS SU2 -- representative
    ON RR.caseRef = SU2.caseReference AND SU2.serviceUserTypeInternal = 'RepresentationContact_Agent'

WHERE LOWER(RR.ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
view_df = spark.sql('SELECT * FROM odw_curated_migration_db.vw_nsip_representation')
view_df.write.mode('overwrite').saveAsTable('odw_curated_migration_db.nsip_representation')
